Articles.Content:
This is my first SSTO capable of taking cargo into LKO its main purpose is deploying satellites, in the album i'm deploying a satellite that can deorbit space debris even after the plane has landed.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited November 25, 2014 by EthanSchlegel
Nicely done, I like how you thought out what you wanted it to do (deploy sats) and then made that your design goal. +1 for directed creativity.
